mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMINBOARD (B_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, IMG_PATH) VALUES (ADMINBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{img_path})
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMINBOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, U_DATE = SYSDATE, IMG_PATH = #{img_path} WHERE B_ID = #{b_id}
mapper.select: SELECT B_ID, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, LIKE_CNT, IMG_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES WHERE B_ID = #{b_id} AND ID = #{id}) FAV FROM ADMINBOARD WHERE B_ID = #{b_id} ORDER BY B_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ADMINBOARD ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC
